author: Lai Kew Chai J:
casename: Tang Yoke Kheng (trading as Niklex Supply Co) v Lek Benedict and Others
counsel: P Suppiah and Elengovan Krishnan (P Suppiah and Co) for plaintiff; Daniel John and Lim Fung Peen (John, Tan and Chan) for first and second defendants; Daryll Ng (Haridass Ho and Partners) for third defendant
tags-parsed: Injunctions/Purposes for grant/Protection of property/Failure to make full and frank disclosure of material facts/Whether plaintiff acted oppressively/Sections 339(1), 339(3), 340(1), 409A Companies Act (Cap 50, 1994 Rev Ed)
